Metadata.title: Golden Luna
Metadata.description: Apartment Golden Luna is the perfect place for a getaway in San Pedro del Pinatar, just 1.8 km from Villananitos Beach and La Mota Beach. Enjoy free parking, Wi-Fi, and excellent sleeping conditions in our cozy air-conditioned apartments, which feature 2 bedrooms, a fully equipped kitchen, and 2 bathrooms. Relax on the terrace, swim in the outdoor pool, or explore the surrounding area, which offers opportunities for hiking, fishing, and squash. Our staff speaks English, Spanish, French, and Norwegian and is always ready to assist you. Book your ideal accommodation today!
Metadata.keywords: Spain, holidays, pool, beach, sun, 2 bedrooms, Costa Calida, bike paths, cycling tours, SUP, jet skiing, kayaking, pink lakes, flamingos, wellness, paella, delicious food, relaxation, family holidays, vacations, Easter in Spain, Fire Festival, attractions, vacation rentals, active recreation, Costa Calida beaches.
